content: halloween is just around the corner and what better way to add a touch of spooky elegance to your decor than with a crochet skull and spider doily this hauntingly beautiful piece combines intricate crochet design with a dash of gothic charm making it a perfect centerpiece for your haunted gatherings the skull and spider doily is not your average crochet piece it blends the traditional crochet method to create the intricate frame of spiders encircling the skull while using the filet crochet technique to create and position the skull at the centerpiece
